WorkItem.ClosedComment: Abbreviations were added some time ago and the info is duplicated in the tooltip
WorkItem.Description: Looks like the width of the Stats pane is just a little shy of handling the full "Optimal Rotation" string for cats. The Mangle+Rake+Shred+Rip+Bite5+Roar rotation is particularly bad, since you never even see the "Bite5+Roar" part.  This happens in both Silverlight and v2.7.  Linewrapping the spillover into a second right-hand-side line would probably fix it nicely.
WorkItem.Summary: [Cat] Optimal Rotation text in Cat module clipped

Comments.Message:
Might it be possible to make the ValueLabel grow into y direction automatically on a newline character?
I have the same issue in the elemental model with the 2t9 bonus.
My suggestion would be to reiterate the statement in a tooltip so that users can see the full thing that way if necessary
Or use shorter abbreviations for the ability names
